about_the_game:
Journey to Foundation is a story-driven sci-fi adventure set in Isaac Asimov’s Foundation universe, built from the ground up for VR.

You are Agent Ward, a galactic spy with the Commission of Public Safety. What begins as a mission to investigate deserters in the Periphery quickly becomes a battle for control of all humanity.

Throughout your journey, you’ll be faced with difficult choices. Decide whether to befriend or double-cross people, determine who lives and dies, and help different factions rise or fall in this branching story.

Will you fight for a dying Empire, or will you join the Foundation to help rebuild what has been lost?

CHOICE & CONSEQUENCE

Make your decisions wisely - they can impact your journey and how others perceive you.

UNIQUE MENTAL ABILITIES

Use the power of Mentalics to influence or destroy your enemies and read their minds.

TOOLS OF THE EMPIRE

Disguise, blast, and hack your way through the galaxy with stealth, combat, and puzzles.




KEY FEATURES
  • Experience a gripping narrative adventure unlike anything else you can find in VR, with 6-8 hours of gameplay
  • Interact with over 90 fully voiced characters brought to life by a top-tier voice cast including Jennifer Hale, François Chau, Jason Hightower, and more…
  • Participate in the drama through an immersive conversation system where you make gestures, look for hidden dialogue choices, and interact with objects
  • Accessibility options to make your journey comfortable: continuous movement, teleportation, snap turn, smooth turn, and vignetting
  • Available with full voice acting and text in English, French, German, and Spanish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7820HK or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • VR Support: Valve Index, HTC Vive, PICO, Oculus using SteamVR or Meta Quest Link
  • Additional Notes: Seated, Standing, Roomscale
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 Home 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i9-10850K or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 Ti or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • VR Support: Valve Index, HTC Vive, PICO, Oculus using SteamVR
  • Additional Notes: Seated, Standing, Roomscale
